A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was awful...
They destroyed beloved characters from the OT.  They went absolutely nowhere with ANY of the interesting plot elements introduced in TFA.  They failed to give Rey any challenges or weaknesses to overcome\, she's just OP for no reason.  They tried to lift up their female characters by making the men look like idiots.
There's a reason this movie divided such a loving fanbase\, and the results were seen with the Box Office failure of Solo.  
There's no way this trilogy can be saved after tossing everything interesting in the trash and going for the "subverts expectations" junk.  It didn't work here\, and didn't work for GoT.  Just stop it.
